message_history.content: you do prajalpa your score gets higher

📢 introducing the prajalpa tracker bot! 🌸
hey everyone! we’ve added a new bot to help us stay focused and spiritually aligned in our chats 🙏

here’s how it works:

🔍 what is prajalpa?
prajalpa refers to unnecessary or idle talk that can distract us from our spiritual goals. this bot gently keeps track of that.

📊 daily leaderboard
every day, a leaderboard is posted showing how we’re doing. lower prajalpa scores are better (less idle talk = good!).
it includes:

✅ your current prajalpa score

🔼 or 🔽 change from yesterday

🆕 for new members

🏆 only verified users appear on the leaderboard.

⚠️ high prajalpa alerts
if your prajalpa score gets too high in a short time, the bot may send you a friendly reminder to check yourself 💡

🌟 reduce your score
taking lord krishna’s name or saying something devotional can help reduce your prajalpa score ✨

🧘‍♂️ why this matters?
this isn’t about shaming—it's about helping each other grow spiritually and stay mindful. we're in this together! ❤️

let’s uplift one another and use our speech for good 🙌
jai shri krishna!
